alert.note: Alert for Bradford (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 01 at 9:44AM EDT until May 03 at 8:00PM EDT by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in New York... Susquehanna River At Binghamton Washington Street affecting Broome County. ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in New York...Pennsylvania... Susquehanna River At Conklin affecting Susquehanna and Broome Counties. Susquehanna River At Waverly/Sayre affecting Tioga and Bradford Counties. Chenango River At Sherburne affecting Chenango County. Chenango River At Greene affecting Chenango County. Chenango River At Chenango Forks affecting Broome County. ...The Flood Warning is cancelled for the following rivers in Pennsylvania... Tunkhannock Creek At Tunkhannock affecting Wyoming County. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL WEDNESDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Susquehanna River At Waverly/Sayre. * WHEN...Until Wednesday evening. * IMPACTS...At 13.0 feet, Flood stage. Widespread, but minor, flooding of the lowlands occurs along the river from the towns of Barton and Nichols, NY to the Athens Township, PA. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:00 AM EDT Monday the stage was 12.5 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late this morning to a crest of 14.7 feet this evening. It will then fall below flood stage Wednesday morning. - Flood stage is 13.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov.
